alert.note: Alert for Escambia (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 20 at 9:26PM CDT until April 25 at 7:00PM CDT by NWS Mobile
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Alabama... Florida... Escambia River Near Century affecting Escambia County. For the Escambia River...including Century...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM SUNDAY MORNING TO MONDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Escambia River Near Century. * WHEN...From Sunday morning to Monday evening. * IMPACTS...At 17.0 feet, Considerable flooding of lowlands. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:05 PM CDT Wednesday the stage was 16.0 feet. - Forecast...The river will rise to 17.0 feet early Monday afternoon. It will then fall to near flood stage by Monday. - Flood stage is 17.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued when updates occur.
